/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a park under a clear blue sky. A winding path, like a ribbon, meanders through the park, inviting visitors to explore its tranquil beauty. The path is bordered by lush green trees and shrubs, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. The sun, a radiant orb of light, shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene. The perspective of the image is from ground level, looking down the path, creating a sense of depth and inviting the viewer to imagine walking down this peaceful path.
